UpdateStageDescription: Downloads the latest Nitrox Linux release automatically
UpdateSourceArgs: -lc "set -e; dir='{{$FullBaseDir}}/nitrox'; mkdir -p \"$dir\"; api='https://api.github.com/repos/SubnauticaNitrox/Nitrox/releases/latest'; url=$(curl -fsSL \"$api\" | grep -oE 'https://[^\\\"]*Nitrox_[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+_linux[_-]x64\\.zip' | head -n1); [ -n \"$url\" ] || { echo 'No linux x64 asset in latest release'; exit 1; }; cd \"$dir\"; file=\"$(basename \"$url\")\"; curl -fL --retry 3 -o \"$file\" \"$url\"; (unzip -o \"$file\" 2>/dev/null || bsdtar -xf \"$file\" || busybox unzip -o \"$file\"); rm -f \"$file\"; p=\"$dir/linux-x64/NitroxServer-Subnautica\"; [ -f \"$p\" ] && chmod +x \"$p\" || true"

-lc "cat > '{{$FullBaseDir}}/run-nitrox.sh' << 'EOF'
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail
BASE='{{$FullBaseDir}}'
# .NET locale
export DOTNET_ROOT="$BASE/dotnet"
export PATH="$DOTNET_ROOT:$PATH"
# XDG/HOME per i config
export HOME="$BASE/home"
export XDG_CONFIG_HOME="$BASE/.config"
export XDG_DATA_HOME="$BASE/.local/share"
export XDG_CACHE_HOME="$BASE/.cache"
# ðŸ‘‰ Path ai file di Subnautica (scaricati in $BASE/game)
export SUBNAUTICA_INSTALLATION_PATH="$BASE/game"
# Avvio
cd "$BASE/nitrox/linux-x64"
exec "$BASE/nitrox/linux-x64/NitroxServer-Subnautica" "$@"
EOF
"
